author: Paul Rankin
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. On a baking tray lay the pancetta flat and put into a hot oven for four minutes until crispy. Drain on kitchen paper. In a hot wok add the sesame oil and choi sum, and stir-fry for two minutes. Next add the soy sauce and then take off the heat. Place the choi sum into a bowl and mix with the mango and coriander. Serve on a plate and top with the crispy pancetta.
